short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to assign names to IP Addresses so you know who is using your account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of who's watching your Netflix.

Netflix shows you streaming activity by IP Address and device type only.
This extension allows you to enter IP Addresses along with the name of who owns that IP
address.  This helps you keep track of who's using it, and identify suspicious activity.


Simply enter the IP Address and the name, and click Save.
Then click the "See Who's Watching!" link to be taken to your Netflix/AccountAccess page.
